title: Dark mode support
description: Add a dark theme option that reduces eye strain during late-night browsing. Should include automatic switching based on system preferences and manual toggle.

title: Advanced search filters
description: Implement comprehensive search functionality with filters for category, date range, vote count, and status. Include saved search presets for power users.

title: Mobile app version
description: Create native mobile apps for iOS and Android with push notifications for updates on followed requests and offline reading capability.

title: Export data functionality
description: Allow users to export their submitted requests, votes, and comments in CSV or JSON format for personal record keeping and analysis.

title: Email notifications
description: Send email updates when requests you've voted on or commented on receive updates, with customizable frequency settings.

title: Duplicate request detection
description: Automatically detect and suggest similar existing requests when users submit new ones to reduce duplicates and consolidate votes.

title: Keyboard shortcuts
description: Add keyboard shortcuts for power users to quickly navigate, vote, and interact with the platform without using the mouse.

title: Rich text editor
description: Upgrade the description field to support rich text formatting including bold, italic, links, and code blocks for better request clarity.

title: API access for integrations
description: Provide REST API endpoints for third-party integrations with project management tools like Jira, Trello, and GitHub.

title: Vote history tracking
description: Allow users to see their voting history and easily find requests they've previously supported or commented on.
